items.sentence: Tom is the only guy I know who can speak French.
You\'re the only one who understands how I feel.
A strange man came up to me and asked for money.
Dr. Jackson is too important to be kept waiting.
Will you be coming to Boston with Tom next week?
Would you like me to ask Tom to do that for you?
Would you like to get married and have children?
A lie is often easier to believe than the truth.
What are you going to do after you leave school?
When Tom was young, he ate three eggs every day.
